author: Michelle Nichols
title: U.N. chief warns against repressive measures amid coronavirus crisis
description: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Thursday the coronavirus could give some countries an excuse to adopt repressive measures for reasons unrelated to the pandemic as he warned that the outbreak risks becoming a human rights crisis.
